author: m.kalinin
content:
As Tim has already mentioned please read Security Considerations section of EIP-3675 to learn about rationale behind TTD and the upgrade mechanics. Regarding optimistic sync, you may read rationale in this section https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/sync/optimistic.md#design-decision-rationale

We're trying to keep rationale for all non-obvious design decisions documented alongside specification; sometimes it's in a separated document, e.g. annotated consensus specs. So, the first step would be seeking for rationale in the spec document itself, and then asking here for clarification or if anything is missed in documentation.
